resources.string: Wait a moment :) I"'"m in the process calculate ..\n(If you wait so much Go out!Your GPS coverage status is low

In a straight line: %1$.2f %6$s 
 Current velocity %2$.2f %6$s/h
 You should go min. %3$.2f %6$s/h all the time
 With current velocity You"'"ll be in %4$.1f minutes 
 With your medium velocity You"'"ll be in %5$.1f minutes
If you go the fastest route according Google your destination is %1$.2f %4$s \n You should go min. %2$.2f %4$s/h all the time\n With current velocity You"'"ll be in %3$.1f minutes

In a straight line: %1$.0f yards or %2$.0f ft 
 Current velocity %3$.4f miles/h 
 You should go min. %4$.4f miles/h 
 With current velocity You"'"ll be in %5$.1f minutes 
 With your medium velocity You"'"ll be in %6$.1f minutes
If you go the fastest route according Google your destination is %1$.0f yards or %2$.0f ft \n You should go min. %3$.4f miles\n With current velocity You"'"ll be in %4$.1f minutes
If users don"'"t increase free limit Google per day*(if you enable internet) I calculate fastest route according Google..
*Without my identity verification Google let me default 1 request per day
Connected to network.\nWait less than minute and click again :)\n(If address is correct)
